title: TOP69CryptoCasinos
author: TOP69CryptoCasinos
content: Hey,I wonder what other gamblers consider to be the most important aspect of a betting site. In my case, it's the speed of approving and processing withdrawals. Knowing that all withdrawals go smoothly, without delays or issues, makes me trust the betting site... even if it may not have the best games, the biggest odds, or the most attractive interface. In the end, it's all about the money. In general, if a betting site makes excuses to delay withdrawals, imposes limits on the amount you can withdraw per day/week/month, or requests an excessive number of documents for a $50 withdrawal, then these are major red flags, at least for me.So, what's the number one thing on your list?

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: The most important thing in an online casino is Provably fair. It's crucial to check that a casino's provably fair is enabled, so that you'd know the house is not taking a complete advantage on the results you get. Although, I've read that some of the casinos still have ways of manipulating the provably fair system. Yet a casino that doesn't have one, isn't a good casino for anybody. Other secondary things like customer services and online reputation are great too, as it'll help to know what kind of casino we are staking games. The casino's time duration; how long they've been in the gambling system is important. As going for a fresh established casino isn't a good idea. Since the reports and reviews about them isn't yet good enough to trust or make them reliable. I'll hardly recommend a new casino to anyone. Payment methods are good too, having different means of depositing and withdrawing our funds are great too, as not everyone would prefer to go with cards or paypal. So, having everyone in mind is an important part of a nice casino to patronize. On the player's end, the need to make these research ourselves is great. Reading their TOS works just fine, not to be a victim in future.
